attributes.additional_details:
Sir,
I wish to propose a petition to support my understanding of British Democracy.
The majority of the electorate did not vote for the current Governement. If the Government was formed as a true coalition (all parties) then there could be no arguement. However is was not and is therefore an unconstitutional partnership rather than a coalition running the country. (Maybe)
Both parties involved have blatantly lied to the electorate and no longer even pretend to represent the issues that they campaigned for.
Therefore I claim that this Government is illegal and unconstitutional and cannot be allowed to prevail.
